column1: Baby Barnaby's////We were visiting Houston and we needed a nice
column2: local feeling spot to try before we hit the road. This place DELIVERED! Such good food
column3: we had wings and waffles and the wings were fantastic. The waffles were also delicious
column4: but I really loved how charming the small area was. It had some outdoor seating and an intimate
column5: cozy area that feels like a diner inside. The manager on that day was great
column6: he made sure he checked on us frequently
column7: was helpful and had some southern humor to match. Would recommend!
